name: Ideabing
tag_list: ideas, innovation, inspiration, startups, technology, news
overview:
Ideabing.com is a blog on innovation, ideas, startups and technology.

Started in Feb 2010, Ideabing focuses on covering the mentioned topics. Ideabing also interviews founders and CEO’s of budding startups. Ideabing has so far interviewed several CEO’s from companies small and large. Ideabing.com sees traffic from about 150 countries worldwide. Ideabing is a multi author blog with in house and guest writers. Ideabing’s topics have seen widespread popularity with readers. The ideas, innovation and interviews have so far inspired a majority of Ideabing’s readers.

Ideabing was founded by Akshaya Murthy, an engineer with two startups under his belt. Ideabing is his third venture.

milestones.description: Mobile2win founder Alok Kejriwal's posts to be featured on Ideabing. Alok is a serial entrepreneur having founded mobile2win, a casual gaming website based out of India. Alok will be blogging on entrepreneurship.

Jayanth Kannan, one of India's foremost authorities on interactive technologies will be writing posts for Ideabing starting Monday - Aug 9 2010.

Ideabing gets featured on Examiner.com. Examiner Leona Charles writes about how ideabing.com is making an impact in entrepreneurship circles.
Ideabing releases the "Ideabing Idea Book" - a collection of all ideas posted on ideabing.com till June 2010. The Ideabing Idea book will be published every 6 months.
milestones.source_description: Something's Cooking At Ideabing- Ideabing Idea Book Published

milestones.description: Ideabing introduces the Startup of the Day and Startup of the Month initiatives. The most innovative startups get featured on Ideabing and also get free advertising on Ideabing.com
milestones.source_description: Ideabing Introduces Startup Of The Day and Startup Of The Month

milestones.description: Ideabing adds Markus Lampien, one of the founding members of GorwVC.com as a guest writer on Ideabing.com
milestones.source_description: Guest Post: Leveraging the grass-roots in building our tomorrow

milestones.description: GrowVC.com will be sponsoring Startup of the day and Startup of the month contests on ideabing.com for the next 6 months. Winning entries will receive all-access memberships to Gorwvc for 1 month and 6 months repectively. This sponsorship will help startu
milestones.source_description: GrowVC to sponsor Ideabing Startup of the day and Startup of the month contests
